sql: SELECT SUM(Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND tours.year = 2020
SELECT SUM(international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar) FROM tours WHERE city IN (SELECT name FROM cities WHERE province = '湖北省') AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(star_hotel_number) FROM tours WHERE city IN (SELECT name FROM cities WHERE province = '湖北省') AND year = 2010
SELECT cities.name, COUNT(*) AS airport_count FROM cities JOIN airports ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT name FROM cities WHERE name NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT city FROM airports INNER JOIN cities ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1)
SELECT cities.name, COUNT(*) AS FiveA_Spots FROM cities JOIN scenicSpots ON Within(scenicSpots.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 AND scenicSpots.level = '5A' GROUP BY cities.name
SELECT provinces.name, Sum(Area(cities.Shape, 1)) as TotalArea FROM provinces JOIN cities ON provinces.name = cities.province GROUP BY provinces.name
SELECT province, SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) AS TotalArea FROM cities GROUP BY province ORDER BY TotalArea DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT province FROM cities ORDER BY MbrMinX(Shape) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT province FROM cities ORDER BY MbrMinY(Shape) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT name FROM cities WHERE province = '河南省' ORDER BY MbrMaxY(Shape) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(scenicSpots.name) FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN stations ON Distance(scenicSpots.Location, stations.Location, 1) < 10 * 1000 WHERE stations.name = '六安' AND scenicSpots.level >= '3A'

SELECT scenicSpots.name, Distance(stations.Location, scenicSpots.Location, 1) AS distance FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN stations ON Distance(stations.Location, scenicSpots.Location, 1) < 100 * 1000 WHERE stations.name = '岳阳东' AND scenicSpots.level = '5A' ORDER BY distance

SELECT GDPs.province, COUNT(airports.IATA) AS airport_count FROM GDPs LEFT JOIN cities ON GDPs.province = cities.province LEFT JOIN airports ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE GDPs.year_2023 = (SELECT MAX(year_2023) FROM GDPs) GROUP BY GDPs.province
SELECT province FROM GDPs ORDER BY year_2023 DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT city FROM tours WHERE year BETWEEN 2011 AND 2020 ORDER BY SUM(international_tourists_number_Wan) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM airports WHERE Within(Location, (SELECT Shape FROM cities WHERE name = '哈尔滨市')) = 1
SELECT Name FROM airports WHERE Within(Location, (SELECT Shape FROM cities WHERE name = '北京市'))
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scenicSpots INNER JOIN cities ON Within(scenicSpots.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE cities.province = '新疆维吾尔自治区' AND scenicSpots.level >= '3A'
SELECT Area(Shape, 1) FROM provinces WHERE name = '西藏自治区'
SELECT SUM(international_toursim_earnings_Wan_dollar) FROM tours INNER JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND year = 2020
SELECT SUM(Shape_Area) FROM cities WHERE province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省')
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM provinces WHERE name IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(cities.name) FROM cities INNER JOIN airports ON Distance(cities.Shape, airports.Location, 1) < 150 * 1000 WHERE airports.Name = '大理'
SELECT s.name, Distance(c.Shape, s.Location, 1) AS distance FROM scenicSpots s, cities c WHERE s.level = '5A' AND c.name = '北京市' ORDER BY distance DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Distance(a.Location, b.Location, 1) AS DistanceInMeters FROM scenicSpots a, scenicSpots b WHERE a.name = '北海公园' AND b.name = '恭王府'
SELECT b.name, Distance(a.Location, b.Location, 1) AS distance FROM scenicSpots a INNER JOIN scenicSpots b ON a.name = '八大处公园' AND b.level = '5A' AND b.name != '八大处公园' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT cities.name FROM airports INNER JOIN cities ON Within(airports.Location, cities.Shape) = 1 WHERE airports.Name = '阿克苏/温宿'
SELECT address FROM scenicSpots WHERE name = '天台山景区'

SELECT t.city, COUNT(ss.name) AS NumberOf5A_ScenicSpots FROM tours t LEFT JOIN scenicSpots ss ON ss.address = t.city AND ss.level = '5A' WHERE t.year = 2020 GROUP BY t.city ORDER BY t.international_tourists_number_Wan DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT cities.province, SUM(tours.Domestic_Tourism_Earnings_Wan_Yuan) AS Domestic_Tourism_Earnings FROM tours JOIN cities ON tours.city = cities.name WHERE cities.province IN ('辽宁省', '吉林省', '黑龙江省') AND tours.year = 2020 GROUP BY cities.province
SELECT b.province, SUM(Area(b.Shape, 1)) as TotalArea FROM GDPs a JOIN cities b ON a.province = b.province WHERE a.year_2023 > (SELECT year_2023 FROM GDPs WHERE province = '浙江省') GROUP BY b.province
SELECT city, star_hotel_number FROM tours WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY star_hotel_number DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT distance FROM buslines WHERE name = '874路'
SELECT name, MAX(distance) as longest_distance FROM buslines
SELECT buslines.name, buslines.start_stop, buslines.end_stop, buslines.distance FROM buslines ORDER BY buslines.distance DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Name, SUM(length) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(length) AS TotalLength FROM roads GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Area(Shape, 1)) FROM greenspaces
SELECT NAME, SUM(Shape_Area) AS Total_Area FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME
SELECT NAME, SUM(Shape_Area) AS Total_Area FROM greenspaces GROUP BY NAME ORDER BY Total_Area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(Shape_Area) FROM greenspaces WHERE NAME = '玄武湖公园'

SELECT districts.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(greenspaces.Shape, districts.Shape), 1)) AS Total_Green_Area FROM greenspaces INNER JOIN districts ON Intersects(greenspaces.Shape, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name

SELECT districts.name, SUM(Area(Intersection(greenspaces.Shape, districts.Shape), 1)) AS total_green_area FROM districts JOIN greenspaces ON Intersects(greenspaces.Shape, districts.Shape) GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY total_green_area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Line, COUNT(*) AS NumberOfStations FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line
SELECT Line, COUNT(*) AS StationCount FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line
SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines WHERE buslines.start_time = '0500'
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(s.Location, h.Location, 1) AS distance FROM hotels h INNER JOIN busstops s ON s.name = '三元巷' ORDER BY Distance(s.Location, h.Location, 1) ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT Line, COUNT(*) AS StationCount FROM subwaystations GROUP BY Line ORDER BY StationCount DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT subways.Line, COUNT(DISTINCT districts.name) FROM subways JOIN subwaystations ON subways.Line = subwaystations.Line JOIN districts ON Within(subwaystations.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY subways.Line
SELECT GLength(Shape, 1) AS Length FROM subways WHERE Line = 'line4'
SELECT DISTINCT s2.Line FROM subways s1 JOIN subways s2 ON Intersects(s1.Shape, s2.Shape) = 1 WHERE s1.Line = 'line10二期' AND s2.Line != 'line10二期'
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) FROM subways
SELECT subwaystations.station, Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1) AS distance FROM agencies JOIN subwaystations WHERE agencies.NAME = '南京市文物局' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT hotels.NAME, Distance(subwaystations.Location, hotels.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations ON Distance(subwaystations.Location, hotels.Location, 1) < 1000 WHERE subwaystations.Line = 'line4' AND subwaystations.station = '鼓楼' ORDER BY Distance

SELECT subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations JOIN ( SELECT Intersection(buslines_874.Shape, buslines_711.Shape) AS IntersectionPoint FROM buslines AS buslines_874 JOIN buslines AS buslines_711 ON buslines_874.name = '874路' AND buslines_711.name = '711路' ) AS bus_intersection ON Distance(bus_intersection.IntersectionPoint, subwaystations.Location, 1) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Distance(bus_intersection.IntersectionPoint, subwaystations.Location, 1) ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(Intersection(roads_a.Shape, roads_b.Shape), subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM roads AS roads_a JOIN roads AS roads_b ON roads_a.Name = '秦淮路' AND roads_b.Name = '将军大道' JOIN subwaystations ON Intersects(Intersection(roads_a.Shape, roads_b.Shape), subwaystations.Location) = 1 ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS Total_Length FROM rails GROUP BY Name
SELECT Name, SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) AS TotalLength FROM rails GROUP BY Name ORDER BY TotalLength DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(GLength(Shape, 1)) FROM rails

SELECT districts.name, COUNT(agencies.NAME) AS NumberOfAgencies FROM districts JOIN agencies ON Contains(districts.Shape, agencies.Location) GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY COUNT(agencies.NAME) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT districts.name FROM subwaystations JOIN districts ON subwaystations.adcode = districts.administrative_division_code WHERE subwaystations.station = '大行宫'
SELECT districts.name FROM agencies JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, agencies.Location) WHERE agencies.NAME = '江苏省海事局'
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM districts ORDER BY area DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) as area FROM districts

SELECT districts.name, COUNT(DISTINCT subways.Line) AS num_lines FROM districts JOIN subwaystations ON districts.administrative_division_code = subwaystations.adcode JOIN subways ON subwaystations.Line = subways.Line GROUP BY districts.name
SELECT hotels.NAME FROM hotels INNER JOIN roads ON Distance(hotels.Location, roads.Shape, 1) < 1000 WHERE roads.Name = '广州路'
SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM agencies, subwaystations WHERE agencies.NAME = '南京市房产局' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT subways.Line) FROM subways JOIN districts ON Intersects(subways.Shape, districts.Shape) = 1 WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'

SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines INNER JOIN busstops ON buslines.start_stop = busstops.name INNER JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, busstops.Location) WHERE districts.name = '六合区' AND buslines.start_time <= '0500'
SELECT districts.name, buslines.name FROM districts JOIN buslines ON Intersects(districts.Shape, buslines.Shape) = 1 WHERE buslines.start_time < '0500'

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(busstops.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS Distance FROM buslines JOIN busstops ON buslines.start_stop = busstops.name OR buslines.end_stop = busstops.name JOIN subwaystations WHERE buslines.name = '709路' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT h.NAME, Distance(a.Location, h.Location, 1) AS Distance FROM agencies a INNER JOIN hotels h ON Distance(a.Location, h.Location, 1) < 500 WHERE a.NAME = '南京市文物局' ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT buslines.name FROM buslines JOIN roads ON Intersects(buslines.Shape, roads.Shape) = 1 WHERE roads.Name = '建康路'

SELECT districts.name, COUNT(agencies.NAME) AS NumberOfAgencies FROM districts JOIN agencies ON Contains(districts.Shape, agencies.Location) GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY COUNT(agencies.NAME) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT hotels.NAME, MIN(Distance(hotels.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations ON subwaystations.station = '南京南站' INNER JOIN districts ON districts.name = '江宁区' AND Within(hotels.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY hotels.NAME ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT districts.name, SUM(GLength(Intersection(districts.Shape, subways.Shape), 1)) AS SubwayLength FROM districts INNER JOIN subways ON Intersects(districts.Shape, subways.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name

SELECT d.name AS District, SUM(GLength(Intersection(d.Shape, s.Shape), 1)) AS Total_Subway_Length FROM districts d JOIN subways s ON Intersects(d.Shape, s.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY Total_Subway_Length DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways JOIN districts ON Intersects(subways.Shape, districts.Shape) = 1 WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'
SELECT DISTINCT districts.name FROM districts JOIN rails ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rails.Shape) = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotels INNER JOIN districts ON Contains(districts.Shape, hotels.Location) WHERE districts.name = '玄武区'
SELECT
SELECT

SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(greenspaces.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM greenspaces JOIN subwaystations WHERE greenspaces.NAME = '郑和公园' GROUP BY subwaystations.station ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT greenspaces.NAME, MIN(Distance(subwaystations.Location, greenspaces.Shape, 1)) AS distance FROM subwaystations INNER JOIN greenspaces ON greenspaces.NAME LIKE '%公园%' WHERE subwaystations.station = '上海路' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(Area(Intersection(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape), 1)) AS TotalArea FROM districts INNER JOIN rivers ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE districts.name = '南京市' AND rivers.Name = '长江'
SELECT DISTINCT subways.Line FROM subways INNER JOIN rivers ON Intersects(subways.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江'
SELECT distinct districts.name FROM rivers INNER JOIN districts ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' AND districts.name LIKE '%南京%'

SELECT districts.name, Sum(Area(Intersection(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape), 1)) AS JiangArea FROM districts INNER JOIN rivers ON Intersects(districts.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.Name = '长江' GROUP BY districts.name
SELECT DISTINCT subwaystations.station FROM subwaystations JOIN rivers ON rivers.Name = '长江' WHERE Distance(rivers.Shape, subwaystations.Location, 1) <= 1000
SELECT DISTINCT buslines.name FROM buslines JOIN rivers ON Intersects(buslines.Shape, rivers.Shape) = 1 WHERE rivers.name = '长江'
SELECT hotels.NAME FROM hotels JOIN rivers ON rivers.Name = '长江' ORDER BY Distance(hotels.Location, rivers.Shape, 1) ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT hotels.NAME, MIN(Distance(agencies.Location, hotels.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM agencies INNER JOIN hotels WHERE agencies.NAME = '高淳县教育局委员会' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1

SELECT greenspaces.NAME, MIN(Distance(subways.Shape, greenspaces.Shape, 1)) AS Distance FROM greenspaces JOIN subways ON subways.Line = 'line1' WHERE greenspaces.NAME LIKE '%公园%' GROUP BY greenspaces.NAME ORDER BY Distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS station_count FROM districts JOIN subwaystations ON Within(subwaystations.Location, districts.Shape) = 1 GROUP BY districts.name

SELECT districts.name, COUNT(*) AS station_count FROM districts JOIN subwaystations ON districts.administrative_division_code = subwaystations.adcode GROUP BY districts.name ORDER BY station_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Line, GLength(Shape, 1) AS length FROM subways ORDER BY length DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT distinct roads.Name FROM roads AS r1 JOIN roads AS r2 ON Intersects(r1.Shape, r2.Shape) = 1 WHERE r1.Name = '东风路' AND r2.Name != '东风路'
SELECT subwaystations.station, MIN(Distance(hotels.Location, subwaystations.Location, 1)) AS distance FROM hotels INNER JOIN subwaystations ON hotels.NAME = '金龙大酒店' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT name, Area(Shape, 1) AS Area FROM districts WHERE name IN ('玄武区', '秦淮区')
